alert.note: Alert for Leflore; Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 24 at 7:28PM CDT until March 24 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Sunflower County in northwestern Mississippi... Northern Leflore County in north central Mississippi... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 727 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Renova, or near Drew, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Parchman around 740 PM CDT. Rome around 745 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Doddsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for north central and northwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
